text: Estonia has participated in all the World Athletics Indoor Championships since 1993. Estonia has won a total of 3 medals (2 silver, 1 bronze) and is 61st on the all time medal table. ==Summary== {| class="wikitable" width=45% style="font-size:90%; text-align:center;" |- !Championships !Athletes |style="background:gold;
